task.title: Logging into and out of HCL Sametime
task.shortdesc: Before you can add a Sametime meeting your Outlook calendar event, you must be logged into Sametime Meetings.

taskbody.context: If you are not already logged into HCL Sametime, you are presented the login screen when you open the add-in.

step.cmd: Locate and click the HCL Sametime Meetings add-in logo ().
Click the Sign in and enter your credentials.
step.info: After the credentials are verified, a list of your currently defined meetings is displayed. Along, with other features such as creating a new meeting are available for you to use.

step.cmd: To log out of Sametime Meetings, click the menu icon ( ) and select Sign out.
